local_intent: Confirm visibility and yaw, align to the T-block, execute a 0.1 push at 90 deg, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Yaw was previously set to 90 deg; block was detected earlier in the sequence.
coherence_with_global: Matches the transfer phase: align, push 0.1 at yaw 90, then verify before subsequent re-align/push cycles.
